item.title: Productivity Tools on all platforms
item.author: wouter.groeneveld@gmail.com (Wouter Groeneveld)
item.description: I’ve grown so accustomed to some of Neal Ford’s The Productive Programmer “power tools” that each time I install a new OS or get a new laptop, I start with my list of cant-live-without tools. I don’t usually switch between OSes a lot, but my recent switch of work environment has opened up the possibility to boot Linux again, next to Windows 10 or of course my beloved own laptop with OSX.
